name: string-join
description: Join array elements into a string with delimiter

input.description: JSON object containing an array at the specified path

path.description: Dot-separated path to array field (e.g., 'items' or 'data.list')

delimiter.description: String to join array elements with (e.g., ',' or ' ')

output.description: String of joined array elements, or null if path doesn't exist or is not an array

examples.description: Join array of strings with comma
Join array of numbers with space
